name: Savory Blue Cheese Cheesecake
author: MissEllaneous
summary: A sensuous appetizer with a variety of textures and flavors. Use any type of fresh herbs you have available. Serve with an assortment of fine crackers.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Whip the cream in a medium bowl until stiff and season with salt and pepper
Set aside 1 ounce of the blue cheese, and mash the rest with a fork in a separate bowl
Stir in the basil, oregano and thyme, then fold in the whipped cream
Place a 3 inch metal ring (or biscuit cutter) onto a serving plate, and fill the bottom with walnuts
Spoon the whipped cream mixture into the ring, and smooth the top
Sprinkle the remaining blue cheese and grapes over the top
